      • processAsJson

        public static java.lang.String processAsJson(OMSQuery query,
                                             java.util.Map<de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMM,java.util.Date> ommList)
        Processes a query and provides the result as a JSON String.
        Parameters:
        query - The OMSQuery to process.
        ommList - A Map<OMM, Date> containing all OMMs to test the query against.
        Returns:
        Query results as a JSON String.

      • processAsPojo

        public static java.util.List<de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMM> processAsPojo(OMSQuery query,

        Processes a query and provides the result as a Plain Old Java Object.
        Parameters:
        query - The OMSQuery to process.
        ommList - A Map<OMM, Date> containing all OMMs to test the query against.
        Returns:
        Query results as a List of OMMs.

        public static java.lang.String processAsJson(OMSQuery query,
                                             de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMM omm,
                                             java.util.Date validAtDate)
        Processes a query and provides the result as a JSON String.
        Parameters:
        query - The OMSQuery to process.
        ommList - A Map<OMM, Date> containing all OMMs to test the query against.
        validAtDate - Validity Date of the memory.
        Returns:
        Query results as a JSON String.

      • setIndentationEnabled

        public static void setIndentationEnabled(boolean value)
        Configures the JSON object mapper's use of indentation.
        Parameters:
        value - True, if indentation is to be used, otherwise false.
